page.title: 10Thame Trade
page.content: Thame offers a variety of trades. The High St. contains many shops of every description.One of the shops today is Taurus China Shop in Bullingdon House. The building is about 300 years old and was originally an old coaching inn. The house contains cellars which were wine cellars, but are now used as storage rooms for china. Mrs Martin, the owner of the shop, showed us a large selection of china pieces, some of which are made locally. {Possible Closure of the Cattle Market} Thame has had a cattle market since the 13th century and this has served the local community. Although the Tuesday market will still operate, many farmers are strongly opposed to the closure of the cattle market, which has been an integral part of the towns life for centuries.
